channel.title: Comments on: Office Inspiration Quotes
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: Career Progression: Delegate your work to people you don't work with and then blame it all on the temp and offer up a solution to make the department efficient.. by shooting everyone
item.content:encoded: Career Progression: Delegate your work to people you don’t work with and then blame it all on the temp and offer up a solution to make the department efficient.. by shooting everyone

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: uhm, retirement is only 20 years away.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
A couple more

Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.

Start off every day with a smile and get it over with.

Success comes in cans, failure in can’ts.

Some people develop a wish bone where their back bone should be.

Some people not only expect opportunity to knock, they expect it to beat down the door.

Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
